record.About Organization: Himpunan Mahasiswa Teknik Informatika (HMTI) is a supervised IT college student organization. Our activities are primarily provide some programs that is related to IT, such as coding and software competition and seminar.
record.Role Description: A3 same as member role in a organization. We helped the senior in program preparation if needed.

record.About Organization: Google Developer Student Club (GDSC) is a student club that is supervised by Google Indonesia. In Udinus at the time, we focused the club to provide place so that IT students (not only in Udinues) can learn and share the knowledge in IT domain (not just Google product).
record.Role Description: Core Team is the teams that manage the sharing place (WA group). Public relation division responsible in making collaboration with other organization and searching for sponsor.

Program.Name: GDSC Udinus Cloud Class 2023
Contribution: Design the curriculum for the cloud class.
Teach the applicants the basic of cloud computing (GCP).
